tasks.label: build and run (MACOS)
tasks.command: ninja;mkdir -p WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks;cp libWhisker-Analysis.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libWhisker-Analysis.dylib;cp libDataManager.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libDataManager.dylib;cp _deps/jkqtplotter6-build/output/libJKQTPlotter6_Release.5.0.0.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libJKQTPlotter6_Release.5.0.0.dylib;cp bin/libqt6advanceddocking.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libqt6advanceddocking.dylib;cp libjanelia.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libjanelia.dylib;cp _deps/jkqtplotter6-build/output/libJKQTMath6_Release.5.0.0.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libJKQTMath6_Release.5.0.0.dylib;cp _deps/jkqtplotter6-build/output/libJKQTMathText6_Release.5.0.0.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libJKQTMathText6_Release.5.0.0.dylib;cp _deps/jkqtplotter6-build/output/libJKQTCommon6_Release.5.0.0.dylib WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Frameworks/libJKQTCommon6_Release.5.0.0.dylib;mkdir -p WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Resources;cp ../../../../packaging/WhiskerToolbox.icns WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/Resources/WhiskerToolbox.icns; WhiskerToolbox.app/Contents/MacOS/WhiskerToolbox
